mobileResponsivenessTip: Optimize the layout for smaller screen sizes to enhance readability of all elements.
loadingSpeedTip: Implement lazy loading for images and reduce JavaScript file sizes to improve page speed.
seoOptimizationTip: Include more structured data markup for events and local business to improve search engine visibility.
userExperienceTip: Streamline the navigation bar to reduce visual clutter for quicker access to key pages.
tips: Add email contact information for better accessibility.
Consider further optimizing image sizes for faster loading on slower networks.
